text: Gabriel Fauré's Piano Quintet in D minor, Op. 89 is the first of his two works in the genre. Dedicated to Eugène Ysaÿe, the Piano Quintet No. 1 was given its premiere in Brussels by the Quatuor Ysaÿe, with Blanche Selva at the piano, on 23 March 1906. There are three movements *Molto moderato *Adagio *Allegretto moderato The playing time of the quintet is about 30 minutes.Murray, p. 159 == References == == Sources == * Category:Compositions by Gabriel Fauré Category:Compositions for piano quintet Category:Compositions in D minor
title: Piano Quintet No. 1 (Fauré)
